column1: The Purple Pig////I've been trying to come to Purple Pig for literally years. In fact
column2: I've tried to dine here on three separate occasions
column3: but the wait was always much too long and inconvenient (1.5-3 hours waiting time--yikes). A friend decided to organize a group of five of us to come here for dinner the Sunday after Saint Patrick's Day parade weekend at 3 PM. There was basically no wait
column5: so we didn't get there until ~3:45. We were seated immediately after our whole group was present.
